title: minced_pork_cooked_without_refrigeration
summary: Cooking minced pork to preserve food due to insufficient electrical power for refrigeration.
description: Minced pork purchased from a local shop for 30 THB is cooked thoroughly to prevent spoilage. This food preparation decision is made due to limited electrical power availability, which prevents the use of a refrigerator. The cooked pork is intended to be consumed over two days.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
